Eng: Increase total damage by {p}%.
Increase total attack speed by {p}%.
Increase the number of moves in the next wave by {p}.
Increase the number of moves by {powerUp.Property[0]}.
Increase the total number of moves by {powerUp.Property[0]}.
Diagonal movement is possible.
Increase the level of {powerUp.Property[0]} randomly selected characters on the puzzle by 1.

Kor: 퍼즐상의 {_groupName} 그룹의 0레벨 케릭터 전체 레벨 1 증가
Eng: Increase the level of all level 0 characters in the {_groupName} group on the puzzle by 1.
From now on, level 0 characters from the {_groupName} group will appear as level 1.

Kor: 적 처치시 경험치 획득량 {p}% 증가||(현재 {EnforceManager.Instance.expPercentage}% 최대 30%)
Eng: Gain {p}% more experience points from defeating enemies (current: {EnforceManager.Instance.expPercentage}%, maximum: 30%).

Kor: 웨이브 종료까지 피해를 입지 않으면 캐슬 체력 {p} 매 웨이브 마다 증가
Eng: If no damage is taken until the end of the wave, castle HP will increase by {p} every wave.
Increase castle's maximum HP by {p}.

Kor: 5개 매치시 가운데 케릭터의 레벨이 1 더 증가
Eng: When matching 5 pieces, the center character's level increases by 1.

Kor: 다음 웨이브 부터는 적 이동속도 {p}% 감소||(현재 {15*EnforceManager.Instance.slowCount}% ||최대 60%)
Eng: Starting from the next wave, reduce enemy movement speed by {p}% (current: {15*EnforceManager.Instance.slowCount}%, maximum: 60%).

Kor: 보스 스테이지 이후 {p} 개의 케릭터 추가 이동 (현재 {EnforceManager.Instance.highLevelCharacterCount})
Eng: After the boss stage, add {p} characters to the movement (current: {EnforceManager.Instance.highLevelCharacterCount}).
Obtain 1 additional gold when matching 5 pieces.
Increase the number of rows by {powerUp.Property[0]}.

Kor: 독에 걸린 적을 공격 시 데미지가 25% 증가합니다.
Eng: When attacking poisoned enemies, damage is increased by 25%.
Increase shackle duration by +0.1 seconds (up to +5 times).

Kor: 이 유닛의 공격으로 죽으면 1칸 범위의 폭발을 일으킵니다. (데미지 100%)
Eng: When this unit's attack kills an enemy, it causes an explosion in a 1-tile range (100% damage).

Kor: 5번째 공격마다 데미지가 3배로 증가한 투사체를 던집니다. (색 변경)
Eng: Every 5th attack, throw a projectile that deals 3 times more damage (color changes).
(For unit 1) Increase attack power by 12% (up to 4 times).
Increase shackle chance by 20% (20% -> 40%).
(For unit 1) Attacks both front and back simultaneously.
Projectiles can pierce through enemies.
(For unit 2) Increase attack speed by 7% (up to 4 times).

Kor: 다른 물리 속성 유닛이 존재할 경우 데미지 35% 증가
Eng: If other physical attribute units exist, damage is increased by 35%.
(For unit 2) Increase attack power by 6% (up to 4 times).

Kor: 공격 시 10% 확률로 초당 공격력의 10% 데미지를 가하는 출혈을 2초간 발생시킵니다.
Eng: 10% chance to inflict bleeding on the enemy for 10% damage per second for 2 seconds.
Attacks will now have an additional sword.

Kor: 둔화된 적을 공격할 시 데미지가 15% 증가합니다.
Eng: When attacking slowed enemies, damage is increased by 15%.

Kor: 검의 크기가 100% 증가합니다. (공격 사거리도 한칸 증가합니다)
Eng: Sword size increases by 100% (attack range also increased by one tile).
(For unit 2) Increase attack power by 18%.
(For unit 3) Increase attack speed by 6% (up to 4 times).
Maximum poison stack increased by 3.

Kor: 중독 데미지 자신의 공격력의 10%만큼 추가로 증가합니다. (최대 3회, 10% -> 20% -> 30% -> 40%)
Eng: Poison damage is increased by an additional 10% of own attack power (up to 3 times, 10% -> 20% -> 30% -> 40%).
Number of projectiles is increased by 1.
Attack range is increased by one tile.
When attacking bleeding enemies, damage is increased by 35%.

Kor: 타격시 중독중인 적의 체력이 7% 미만이면 즉사시킵니다.
Eng: If the enemy with poison is below 7% health when hit, they will be instantly killed.

Kor: 유닛이 타격할 때마다 적에게 초당 10% 데미지를 가하는 중독을 4초간 발생시킵니다.
Eng: The unit inflicts poison on the enemy, dealing 10% damage per second for 4 seconds with each hit.
The maximum stack of burn increases by 1 (up to a maximum of 5 stacks).
(For unit 6) Increase attack speed by 6% (up to 4 times).
When attacking slowed enemies, damage is increased by 10%.

Kor: 투사체 속도가 100% 증가하고, 반드시 명중합니다. (공격형태를 유도 투사체로 변경)
Eng: Projectile speed is increased by 100% and will always hit the target (changes the attack type to homing projectile).

Kor: 화상에 걸린 적이 죽을 시 폭발합니다. (주변 1칸에 공격력의 200% 데미지)
Eng: If an enemy affected by burn dies, it explodes (dealing 200% of attack damage) in a 1-tile range around it.

Kor: 적 적중 시 가장 가까운 적에게 발사체가 튕겨 데미지를 입힙니다.
Eng: Upon hitting an enemy, the projectile bounces to the nearest enemy, dealing damage.

Kor: 적을 공격하면 5초동안 화상을 입히며 초당 10%의 데미지를 줍니다.
Eng: When attacking enemies, inflict burn for 5 seconds, dealing 10% damage per second.
The number of projectile bounces is increased.
(For unit 8) Increase attack speed by 6% (up to 4 times).

Kor: 다른 물 속성 아군이 존재하면 더 이상 둔화를 걸지 않는 대신 데미지가 200% 증가합니다.
Eng: If other water attribute allies are present, no longer inflict slow, but damage is increased by 200%.
The number of projectiles launched is increased by 1.
(For unit 8) Increase attack power by 12% (up to 4 times).
When attacking slowed enemies, damage is increased by 20%.

Kor: (매 웨이브당 1번) 이 유닛이 100번 공격 시 화면 내에 존재하는 모든 적에게 -20% 둔화를 1초간 부여합니다. (필드 내 모든 해당 유닛의 공격 횟수 합산, 웨이브마다 초기화)
Eng: (Once per wave) After this unit attacks 100 times, apply -20% slow for 1 second to all enemies on the field (sum of all corresponding unit's attack count, resets each wave).

Kor: 둔화중인 적을 공격 시 40% 확률로 적을 0.1초간 기절 시킵니다.
Eng: When attacking slowed enemies, there is a 40% chance to stun them for 0.1 seconds.

Kor: 이 유닛에게 피격당한 적은 5초간 받는 데미지가 15% 증가합니다.
Eng: Enemies hit by this unit receive 15% increased damage for 5 seconds.

Kor: 독에 걸린 적을 공격 시 데미지 15% 증가
Eng: When attacking poisoned enemies, damage is increased by 15%.
(For unit 5) Increase attack speed by 6% (up to 4 times).
The maximum number of burn stacks is increased by 3.
(For unit 5) Increase attack power by 12% (up to 4 times).

Kor: 독에 걸린 적을 공격 시 20% 확률로 적을 0.5초간 기절시킵니다. (이미 기절중인 경우 효과 없음)
Eng: When attacking poisoned enemies, there is a 20% chance to stun them for 0.5 seconds (no effect if already stunned).

Kor: 검의 크기가 100% 증가합니다. (공격 사거리도 한칸 증가합니다)
Eng: Sword size is increased by 100% (attack range is also increased by one tile).
Attack range is increased by one tile.

Kor: 더이상 화상을 발생시키지 않는 대신 데미지 150% 증가
Eng: No longer inflicts burn, but damage is increased by 150%.
Increase the duration of slow by +0.1 seconds (up to 5 times).
(For unit 4) Increase attack speed by 6% (up to 4 times).

Kor: 출혈 중인 적을 공격 시 10% 확률로 적을 0.5초간 기절시킵니다. (이미 기절중인 경우 효과 없음)
Eng: When attacking bleeding enemies, there is a 10% chance to stun them for 0.5 seconds (no effect if already stunned).

Kor: 이 유닛이 적을 죽이면죽은 적의 위치에서 좌우로 고드름이 발사됩니다. (공격력의 100% 데미지, 공격과 동일한 투사체 속도)
Eng: When this unit kills an enemy, ice pillars are launched left and right from the enemy's position (dealing 100% of attack damage, same projectile speed as the attack).
(For unit 4) Increase attack power by 12% (up to 4 times).
Projectile speed is increased by 50%.
The strength of slow is increased by 10% (from 30% to 40%).

Kor: 자신과 인접한 아군유닛들에게 공격속도 +10%를 부여합니다. (대각선 포함)
Eng: Grant adjacent allied units a 10% increase in attack speed (including diagonal directions).

Kor: 10번째 공격마다 데미지가 3배로 증가한 투사체를 던집니다. (색 변경)
Eng: Every 10th attack, throw a projectile that deals 3 times more damage (changes color).
(For unit 7) Increase attack speed by 6% (up to 4 times).
(For unit 7) Increase attack power by 6% (up to 4 times).

Kor: 상태이상에 걸린 적을 공격하면 10%확률로 500%의 데미지를 입힙니다.
Eng: When attacking enemies affected by status ailments, there is a 10% chance to deal 500% damage.
When attacking enemies, there is a 10% chance to knock them back.

Kor: 상태이상에 걸린 적을 공격하면 데미지가 15% 증가합니다. (상태이상 갯수는 체크하지 않음)
Eng: When attacking enemies affected by status ailments, damage is increased by 15% (number of status ailments is not checked).
Attack range is increased by one tile.

Kor: 상태이상에 걸린 적을 공격하면 1초동안 -20% 둔화를 부여합니다.
Eng: When attacking enemies affected by status ailments, apply -20% slow for 1 second.
